__prompts__.project_name: Enter the project name (should be your repository name)
__prompts__.developer_redhat_username: Enter your Openshift sandbox name (to push images to your Quay.io account and configure OpenShift access to deploy mlflow). It should be the name of your namespace in OpenShift, without '-dev'.
__prompts__.quay_username: Your username on Quay.io (to push container images).
